title: gabl.ink content JSON schema
description: schema for gabl.ink content JSON files

base.description: [string] the part of the item’s ID after the last slash

published.description: [object] calendar date of the item’s first publication (UTC)

day.description: [integer] day of the month of the item’s first publication (UTC)

month.description: [integer] number of the month of the item’s first publication (UTC)

year.description: [integer] calendar year of the item’s first publication (UTC)

revised.description: [object] calendar date of the item’s last revision (UTC)

day.description: [integer] day of the month of the item’s latest revision (UTC)

month.description: [integer] number of the month of the item’s latest revision (UTC)

year.description: [integer] calendar year of the item’s latest revision (UTC)
